trans-unit.source: A general-purpose class that represents a binding to a named parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示命名参数绑定的通用类。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The binding is to the source of an `in` parameter, or the target of an `out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]所绑定到的源是`in`参数或目标的`out`参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ParameterName property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 ParameterName 属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the parameter being bound.
trans-unit.target: 表示正在绑定的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is the user-defined name of the parameter to which the binding applies.
trans-unit.target: 这是参数的用户定义的绑定应用名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter being bound.
trans-unit.target: 正在绑定的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The dependency property which targets <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.ParameterName*>.
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性的目标<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.ParameterName*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.ParameterName*>

trans-unit.source: Each of the public `properties` and `events` of this type is accessed indirectly by the resolution of a corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 每个公共`properties`和`events`此访问类型的间接通过解析对应的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>

trans-unit.source: This is the `public static field` named `XProperty`, respectively `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding `property`,respectively `event`.
trans-unit.target: 这是`public static field`名为`XProperty`分别`XEvent`，其中 X 是对应`property`分别`event`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value assigned to the corresponding parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分配给对应参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value as an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Object>。</xref:System.Object>所赋的值

trans-unit.source: The dependency property which targets <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性的目标<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.Value*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBinding.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Each of the public `properties` and `events` of this type is accessed indirectly by the resolution of a corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 每个公共`properties`和`events`此访问类型的间接通过解析对应的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>

trans-unit.source: This is the `public static field` named `XProperty`, respectively `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding `property`, respectively `event`.
trans-unit.target: 这是`public static field`名为`XProperty`分别`XEvent`，其中 X 是对应`property`分别`event`。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
